message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $15000. Considering the exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am proposing a special introductory price of $14000 for you. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product that is not only worth $15000 to you but also comes with a special discount. I look forward to your positive response.
